Package adaptableLearningRates

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LearningRates.LRCommon  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActivationFunction  
    AlphaBound
    Implementation of Dabney and Barto's Alpha-Bounds algorithm.
    AutoStep
    Implementation of Mahmood's Autostep algorithm based on Sutton's linear IDBD.
    ELK1
    Implementation of Suttons linear K1-algorithm and Schraudolphs non-linear extension ELK1.
    IDBD
    Implementation of Suttons linear IDBD and Koop's non-linear IDBD for a logistic activation function.
    IDBDwk
    Wolfgang Konens non-linear extension of IDBD with tanh() as activation-function.
    IDBDwk.IDBDwkCommon
    Maintains two parameters, that are common for all weights of the system in IDBD_WK.
    IRprop
    Implementation of the iRProp+ algorithm.
    IRprop.IRpropCommon  
    LearningRates
    An abstract class, mainly providing abstract methods for classes implementing learning-rate systems.
    STDLearningRate  
    TemporalCoherence
